title: Hello Brother Lyrics Irumbu Kuthirai Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Hello Brother
Singers: Chinna Ponnu, Suchitra, K.G.Ranjith
Music: G.V.Prakash Kumar
Movie: Irumbu Kuthirai
Lyrics: Pa Vijay

Hello Brother ennamaa
partykkuthaan polaama
Hello Brother ennamaa
partykkuthaan polaama
vodka oru sippu no water ma

en paattil indha paatil
eththanayo bottle-ah
Wine rainu adikkudhu
namma kaattilaa .

Dance flooril nikkum podhu
ellorumey single aah ?
poraappa mattumdhaama
double double aah.

Yei ichu ichu da
oru kichu kichu da
un ichi pichikka
idhal vachi thachitta

Yei thottu thottutaa
viral lesa pattutaa
karai onum aagaadhu
kan thatti vittuttaa.

Ada ennai suththiyum
valai pinni kolludhey
vidhi podum aattathil
thalai suthi nikkudhey.

Yen moththa boomiyum
ennai oda solludho
naan ennai yaar ena
enai kettka solludhey.

Nenje maarividu
aaattam aadavidu
dhukkam meera vidu
inbam yeravidu.

Hello Brother ennamaa
partykkuthaan polaama
Hello Brother ennamaa
partykkuthaan polaama
vodka oru sippu no water ma

en paattil indha paatil
eththanayo bottle-ah
Wine rainu adikkudhu
namma kaattilaa .

Dance flooril nikkum podhu
ellorumey single aah ?
poraappa mattumdhaama
double double aah.
